Text.Page:
The undead in Berzerad Cemetery are restless and need to be returned to the Dream.

Defeat the {@LinkCreature:3#300611#furious dragoons}, {@LinkCreature:3#301080#fallen soldiers}, and {@LinkCreature:3#16#defenders}.

Report to Denine in Crescentia when mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation, <PCCLASS:lcase>.
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet. Embarrassing!
